event_data.continuation_prompt:
Mission: StageOrchestrator API Compatibility - Final Validation (Cycle 2)
=========================================================

CONTEXT:
Cycle 1 completed all implementation work for the StageOrchestrator API compatibility fix. The modular af_engine now has 100% backward API compatibility with the legacy RDMissionController. 51 tests pass across all test categories.

IMPLEMENTED IN CYCLE 1:
- mission setter property in orchestrator.py:105-108
- mission_dir property in orchestrator.py:120-123 and state_manager.py:307-313
- load_mission() method in orchestrator.py:413-416
- load_mission_from_file() method in orchestrator.py:418-452
- set_mission() method in orchestrator.py:474-612
- reset_mission() method in orchestrator.py:614-629
- _queue_processing flag in orchestrator.py:77
- RDMissionController alias in orchestrator.py:633

OBJECTIVE FOR CYCLE 2:
Perform final validation and confirm mission completion.

TASKS:
1. Run the existing test suite to confirm all 51 tests still pass
2. Verify the feature flag USE_MODULAR_ENGINE is properly set
3. Perform one integration smoke test using atlasforge_conductor patterns
4. Generate final mission completion report

FILES TO VALIDATE:
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/orchestrator.py
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/state_manager.py
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/missions/mission_829fd261/workspace/tests/test_api_compatibility.py

SUCCESS CRITERIA:
- All 51 tests pass
- No AttributeError or property setter errors
- atlasforge_conductor.py patterns work without modification

PRIORITY: HIGH - This is the final validation cycle before mission completion.

cycle_report.summary: Cycle 1 successfully completed the StageOrchestrator API Compatibility Audit & Fix mission. All missing methods, properties, and setters have been implemented in orchestrator.py and state_manager.py. The modular af_engine now achieves 100% backward API compatibility with the legacy RDMissionController, enabling atlasforge_conductor.py to work without modification.
files_modified: /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/orchestrator.py - Added: mission setter (lines 105-108), mission_dir property (lines 120-123), load_mission() method (lines 413-416), load_mission_from_file() method (lines 418-452), set_mission() method (lines 474-612), reset_mission() method (lines 614-629), _queue_processing flag (line 77), RDMissionController alias (line 633)
/home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/state_manager.py - Added: mission setter (lines 48-54), mission_dir property (lines 307-313), workspace helper methods (lines 315-332)
achievements: Implemented mission setter in StageOrchestrator (was causing 'property has no setter' error)
Added mission_dir property to both StageOrchestrator and StateManager
Implemented load_mission() method for backward compatibility
Implemented load_mission_from_file() method for template loading
Created RDMissionController alias for drop-in replacement
Developed comprehensive test suite: 16 API tests + 14 adversarial tests + 3 integration tests + 11 functional tests + 7 conductor patterns = 51 total tests
Validated all three original error cases are resolved
Achieved 100% epistemic score on test coverage
issues: No remaining issues - all implementation work is complete
